name: Tower Denfense 3D
description:
This is the first game 3D I publish. Heavily based on Brackey's Tower Defense tutorial series, I edited and made it my own by adding some extra functions like random enemies, added game music. It helps me learn a lot about Unity 3D.

Controls

  • Using WASD  for move camera.
  • Select turret and press J for upgrade turret or K for sell turret.
  • Esc or P  with open menu game.
